code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Map from'./Map';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LocationInput=()=>{const[location,setLocation]=useState('');const[pinnedLocation,setPinnedLocation]=useState(null);const handleInputChange=event=>{setLocation(event.target.value);};const handlePinLocation=()=>{setPinnedLocation(location);setLocation('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Choose location:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:location,onChange:handleInputChange,placeholder:"Enter location"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handlePinLocation,disabled:!location,children:"Pin Location"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Map,{location:pinnedLocation})]});};export default LocationInput;
